title: Piyush Bhandari
text: Groww's UI is far superior to other broking apps. However, in the current update the UI doesn't seem user friendly. At the position screen, the average price of the trade is at the left side and the market price is at the right side. However, if you click on any trade, the market price is at the left and average price is at the right. This creates confusion when we have to make an immediate decision in F&O. Please fix this issue.
author: Piyush Bhandari

title: Umang Jha
text: Very basic 3 things are missing in Orders and Holdings views in this trading platform. a. Percentage % up - down of the shares on the same day b. Separate view for same trading day for buy-sell of stocks. currently, stocks directly add up or deduct from the positions for mtf and holding stocks. not very comfortable to understand same day performance. Also, when we place any order and try to edit that after sometime, it doesn't allow to directly modify without canceling the previous order.
